title: leave buster and remake
body:
how is it fair if we have a leave buster ban and someone is afk on your team and then you remake but then you have to wait another 20 minutes
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

A remake basically makes the game you just played nonexistant, all systems pretend the game never happened and this includes leaverbuster.

In order to reduce/remove your leaverbuster punishment you must COMPLETE matchmade games.
